document_data.name: Dark Linsa
document_data.mainbody: '''Dark Linsa''' was a thief in [[Phlan]] working for the [[Welcomers]] [[thieves guild]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Malady of Elventree|8}}
document_data.History: After [[Vorgansharax]]'s coup, the Welcomers allied with the [[Zhentarim]]. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she was sent by the [[Zhent]]s to keep control of a celebration in honor of [[Mielikki]] in the village of [[Elventree]] in [[Cormanthor]]. She had a message from [[Chaab]] to fellow Zhents.
